short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tab manager that organizes tabs based on your mood

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview: Are you overwhelmed by countless open tabs? Struggling to focus on your tasks with all those distractions? Meet the Mood-Based Tab Manager, your ultimate solution for better tab management and increased productivity. This Chrome extension lets you organise and manage your tabs based on your current mood or focus level, helping you to stay on track with your tasks.

Key Features:
Mood Categories: Define and switch between mood categories like "Work," "Relax," "Social," and more. Customise each mood with specific tabs to suit your workflow.

Customisable Moods: Personalise your mood categories by assigning specific websites and settings to each mood. Tailor the experience to match your needs.

Site Management: Pre-assign moods to specific sites, ensuring that your tabs are automatically organised when you visit them. 


Tab Management: Seamlessly switch between moods, with the extension automatically grouping and hiding tabs that don't fit the selected mood. Supports multi-mood selection for those who juggle multiple tasks.

User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface for selecting moods, managing tabs, and adjusting settings.

DND Mode (Do Not Disturb): Activate DND mode to block all notifications from websites, ensuring complete focus on your tasks.

Shortcuts:  Easily manage and switch between moods with customisable keyboard shortcuts, allowing you to quickly organise your tabs based on your current focus or activity.

Why Choose Mood-Based Tab Manager? This extension simplifies your browsing experience by categorising your tabs according to your current mood, making it easier to focus on what’s important. Whether you're working, relaxing, or socialising, you can ensure that only the relevant tabs are visible, reducing distractions and boosting productivity.


Using Mood-Based Tab Manager:

Switching Moods:
  Click on the extension icon and select your current mood from the list.
  The extension will automatically group and hide tabs that don’t match the selected 
  mood. You can select multiple moods if needed.

Site Management:
  Pre-assign moods to specific websites via the "Site Management" tab in the 
  settings menu.This ensures that tabs related to these sites are automatically organised based on the assigned mood.

DND Mode (Do Not Disturb):
 Activate DND mode by selecting it from the mood list.While DND is active, all notifications from websites will be blocked, allowing you to focus without 
 interruptions.


Future Features (Coming Soon):
 Mood Tracker Integration: The extension will soon integrate with mood tracking 
   apps to automatically adjust your tab organisation based on your mood.

AI-Driven Suggestions: Get personalised suggestions for mood settings based on your browsing history, enhancing the extension’s adaptability.

Memory Optimisation: Memory optimisation through advanced tab discarding will be available to reduce the system load, making your browsing experience smoother.
